name: Punch Through
text: You and your allies are adept at bypassing enemy defenses.
benefit: As a full-round action, you may make a single attack against a target. If the attack hits and deals damage to the target, all of your allies with this feat ignore up to 5 points of damage reduction against the same target for 1 round. This feat does not apply to damage reduction without a type (such as DR 10/â€”).
